problem_names:
lemma height_size1_exp:
  "wbt t \<Longrightarrow> t \<noteq> Leaf \<Longrightarrow> 2 \<le> (1-\<alpha>) ^ (height t - 1) * size1 t"

lemma height_size1_log: assumes "wbt t" "t \<noteq> Leaf"
shows "height t \<le> (log 2 (size1 t) - 1) / log 2 (1/(1-\<alpha>)) + 1"
translations: lemmas neq0_if = less_imp_neq dual_order.strict_implies_not_eq

locale WBT0 =
fixes \<alpha> :: real
assumes alpha_pos: "0 < \<alpha>" and alpha_ub: "\<alpha> \<le> 1/2"
begin

fun wbt :: "'a tree \<Rightarrow> bool" where
"wbt Leaf = True" |
"wbt (Node l _ r) = (wbt l \<and> wbt r \<and> (let ratio = size1 l / (size1 l + size1 r)
  in \<alpha> \<le> ratio \<and> ratio \<le> 1 - \<alpha>))"

lemma height_size1_exp:
  "wbt t \<Longrightarrow> t \<noteq> Leaf \<Longrightarrow> 2 \<le> (1-\<alpha>) ^ (height t - 1) * size1 t"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>wbt t; t \<noteq> \<langle>\<rangle>\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> 2 \<le> (1 - \<alpha>) ^ (height t - 1) *
                              real (size1 t)
proof(induction  t)

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<lbrakk>wbt \<langle>\<rangle>;
     \<langle>\<rangle> \<noteq> \<langle>\<rangle>\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> 2 \<le> (1 - \<alpha>) ^
                              (height \<langle>\<rangle> - 1) *
                              real (size1 \<langle>\<rangle>)
 2. \<And>t1 x2 t2.
       \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk>wbt t1; t1 \<noteq> \<langle>\<rangle>\<rbrakk>
                \<Longrightarrow> 2 \<le> (1 - \<alpha>) ^ (height t1 - 1) *
    real (size1 t1);
        \<lbrakk>wbt t2; t2 \<noteq> \<langle>\<rangle>\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> 2 \<le> (1 - \<alpha>) ^ (height t2 - 1) *
                                  real (size1 t2);
        wbt \<langle>t1, x2, t2\<rangle>;
        \<langle>t1, x2, t2\<rangle> \<noteq> \<langle>\<rangle>\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> 2 \<le> (1 - \<alpha>) ^
                                 (height \<langle>t1, x2, t2\<rangle> - 1) *
                                 real (size1 \<langle>t1, x2, t2\<rangle>)

lemma height_size1_log: assumes "wbt t" "t \<noteq> Leaf"
shows "height t \<le> (log 2 (size1 t) - 1) / log 2 (1/(1-\<alpha>)) + 1"

goal (1 subgoal):

    \<le> (log 2 (real (size1 t)) - 1) / log 2 (1 / (1 - \<alpha>)) + 1
